dcterms:creator: B. Geiger
E. Sillekens
F. Ferreira
R. Killey
L. Galdino
P. Bayvel
dcterms:description: The dataset includes experimental results from the EPSRC National Dark Fibre Facility, demonstrating high-speed transmission capabilities over a 39 km field-deployed fibre link.
dcterms:title: EPSRC National Dark Fibre Facility (NDFF)

dcterms:creator: Y. Frignac
D. Le Gac
A. Lorences-Riesgo
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to a record transmission experiment over field-deployed single-mode fibre using S+C+L bands, showcasing high data rates and advanced amplification techniques.
dcterms:title: S+C+L-band transmission system

dcterms:creator: Y. Wakayama
T. Gerard
E. Sillekens
dcterms:description: The Generalised Mutual Information (GMI) dataset provides metrics for evaluating the performance of high-order modulation formats in optical communication systems.
dcterms:title: Generalised Mutual Information (GMI)

dcterms:creator: Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB)
dcterms:description: This dataset includes low-density parity check codes used for decoding in satellite broadcasting and broadband applications, specifically for DVB-S2X.
dcterms:title: DVB-S2X low-density parity check codes

dcterms:creator: D. Semrau
R. I. Killey
P. Bayvel
dcterms:description: The Gaussian noise model dataset provides a closed-form approximation for analyzing noise in optical communication systems, particularly in the presence of inter-channel stimulated Raman scattering.
dcterms:title: Gaussian noise model

dcterms:creator: E. Sillekens
G. Liga
D. Lavery
P. Bayvel
R. I. Killey
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on geometrically-shaped modulation formats, providing insights into high-cardinality geometrical constellation shaping for nonlinear fibre channels.
dcterms:title: Geometrically-shaped modulation formats
